fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Restabalize an authorized target.
- Restabalize yourself, even if you are not authorized. 1 use.
- Restabilize any unauthorized target. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Restabalization will cause all and any cause of death to a target to fail, regardless of the specifics of the cause of death. This does absolutely nothing else, such as remove Poison. Contact a Patrol for that.
- If your target is not a Sentry, restabalization will instead grant them a Powerful defense auto-vest.
- Oh yeah, you can't tell the difference between the two. All you'll know is if you saved your target from literally anything the night you targeted them.
